recipes.title: Falafel
recipes.decription: A delicious falafel made with love
recipes.ingredients: vegetable oil ,1small onion , 1garlic clove , 400g can chickpea, tsp ground cumin, 1 tsp dried mix herbs
recipes.method: soaking the chickpeas,Once the chickpeas soak, pulse them together with the other ingredients,Add the chickpeas to the food processor with the ingredients,Next form the falafel balls.Finally, bake

recipes.title: Döner
recipes.decription: A delicious Döner made with love
recipes.ingredients: tablespoon olive oil,onion, chopped ,tablespoon curry powder ,600g chicken
recipes.method: soaking the chickpeas,Once the chickpeas soak, pulse them together with the other ingredients,Add the chickpeas to the food processor with the ingredients,Next form the falafel balls.Finally, bake
